p: With global pandemic spreading, most of us may get the SARS-CoV-II infection at a certain period. Therefore, individual actions that minimize the infection risk and modulate the severity of the clinical courses are crucial amidst all public healthcare measures. Fig. 1 represents this conceptual framework. In this article, we reviewed the personal preventive measures, the predisposing host factors, some potential therapeutically options, and suggested a comprehensive approach for COVID-19 management.
